title: adult by accident_stolen treasure
description:
Adult by Accident 
Stolen Treasure Ep 

The New Ep from Adult By Accident produced by Total Control 

Jellyhead,
Whipping Boy, 
What&#039;s Wrong & 
Let Truth Be Your Shield 

also bonus live tracks recorded on 14/05/2008 at zanzibar, liverpool


                                                                            

&#039;Their brand of groove-driven rock is not 
for the faint of heart, and it leaves you wanting more&#039; 
(Northpoint, icompositions member)



Biography: Scuzzed up disco-punkers Adult By Accident can be currently found demolishing the local live scene in Liverpool with choruses catchier than herpes and the chaotic energy of the Clash, they create a blizzard of tight infectious grooves. 

Freshly formed in Jan 2008, they&#039;ve just finished work on their debut EP Stolen Treasure and just shy of 10,000 myspace hits, are busy building up a loyal following and generating great positive feedback. 

 Sounding like a funky punky mash up and sharing the same deranged ballpark as the Futureheads, they&#039;ve been busy slaying crowds at Barfly, Korova and Cavern Club, as well as regular slots at the famous Zanzibar Club.


Catch Adult By Accident this summer around Liverpool! 

July Dates: 
06/07/08 Liverpool      Redfest @Barfly 
21/07/08 Liverpool        Swan Inn 
July/08 Liverpool  Cavern Club 
July/08  Liverpool  Korova


Contact: Terry Gray 56 Lark Lane Liverpool L17 8UU   07723 887925
